name: FURI
description: OYABUN is a Web3 gaming ecosystem set in a futuristic, manga-inspired universe. The project currently includes two games: OYABUN, a Move2Earn and Fight2Earn mobile game offering strategic short-session gameplay with opportunities to earn and trade in-game assets, and Street Fury, a Free2Play Telegram game featuring Tap2Earn mechanics and daily challenges for a broad audience. By enabling interoperability of NFTs and tokens across games, OYABUN ensures long-term sustainability and asset value. With innovative AI and AR features in development and additional games planned, OYABUN is committed to creating a dynamic Web3 gaming experience and a sustainable economy for players and investors alike.
